ygData.subject: Search engine REST interface

Hi,

this is the documentation for a REST interface to a search engine I ha=
ve been 
working on:

http://www.focuseek.com/en/searchbox/manual/restinter=
face.html

I'd appreciate any feedback you might have.

One glaring problem=
 is the use of a "magic" cookie instead of a much more 
RESTful use of ETag=
s, in the search index configuration. Unfortunately the 
REST interface is =
running as a CGI, and the CGI environment doesn't give me 
control at the I=
f-Match stage. I'm planning on fixing this either by going 
the Apache modu=
le way, or by rolling a mini web server.

Other than general comments on RE=
STfullness, would you produce DTDs or schemas 
for the XML documents? (yeah=
, XML is not a requirement of REST, it's just a 
useful convention) Would y=
ou output more useful error documents instead of 
just e.g. "406 'query' pa=
rameter can't be null"?

Thanks,
Duncan
